content.text:
# 1st Critics' Choice Super Awards

| location         =
| country          = United States
| host             = Kevin Smith, Dani Fernandez
| most_awards        = Film:Palm Springs / Soul (3) Television:The Boys (4)
| most_nominations = Film:Palm Springs (5)Television:Lovecraft Country (6)
| award1_type = Action
| award1_winner = Film:Da 5 BloodsTelevision:Vikings
| award2_type = Animation
| award2_winner = Film:SoulTelevision:BoJack Horseman
| award3_type = Horror
| award3_winner = Film:The Invisible ManTelevision:Lovecraft Country
| award4_type = Science Fiction/Fantasy
| award4_winner = Film:Palm SpringsTelevision:The Mandalorian
| award5_type = Superhero
| award5_winner = Film:The Old GuardTelevision:The Boys

| main             = Critics' Choice Super Awards

The '''1st Critics' Choice Super Awards', presented by the Critics Choice Association, honoring the best in genre fiction film and television, were held on January 10, 2021. They were broadcast by the CW, during which Patrick Stewart and Sonequa Martin-Green accepted the Legacy Award for the Star Trek franchise.
The nominations were announced on November 19, 2020. The ceremony was held virtually, and adhered to social distancing guidelines, due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
Winners and nominees
Film

|-
| colspan="2" style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"|
* 'Da 5 Bloods (Netflix)'
** Bad Boys for Life (Sony)
** Extraction (Netflix)
** Greyhound (Apple TV+)
** The Hunt (Universal)
** Mulan (Disney+)
** The Outpost (Screen Media)
** Tenet (Warner Bros.)
|-
| style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"|
* 'Delroy Lindo – Da 5 Bloods as Paul (Netflix)'
** Tom Hanks – Greyhound as Commander Ernest Krause (Apple TV+)
** Chris Hemsworth – Extraction as Tyler Rake (Netflix)
** Caleb Landry Jones – The Outpost as Specialist Ty Michael Carter (Screen Media)
** Will Smith – Bad Boys for Life as Detective Lieutenant Michael Eugene "Mike" Lowrey (Sony)
** John David Washington – Tenet as The Protagonist (Warner Bros.)
| style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"|
* 'Betty Gilpin – The Hunt as Crystal Creasey (Universal)'
** Yifei Liu – Mulan as Mulan (Disney+)
** Blake Lively – The Rhythm Section as Stephanie Patrick (Paramount)
** Iliza Shlesinger – Spenser Confidential as Cissy Davis (Netflix)
** Hilary Swank – The Hunt as Athena Stone (Universal)
|-
| colspan="2" style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"|
* 'Soul (Disney+)'
** Onward (Disney+)
** Over the Moon (Netflix)
** A Shaun the Sheep Movie: Farmageddon (Netflix)

** Wolfwalkers (Apple / GKIDS)
|-
| style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"|
* 'Jamie Foxx – Soul as Joe Gardner (Disney+)'
** Will Forte – The Willoughbys as Tim Willoughby (Netflix)

** John Krasinski – Animal Crackers as Owen Huntington (Netflix)
** Chris Pratt – Onward as Barley Lightfoot (Disney+)
** Sam Rockwell – The One and Only Ivan as Ivan (Disney+)
| style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"|
* 'Tina Fey – Soul as 22 (Disney+)'
** Honor Kneafsey – Wolfwalkers as Robyn Goodfellowe (Apple / GKIDS)
** Maya Rudolph – The Willoughbys as Linda a.k.a. The Nanny (Netflix)
** Phillipa Soo – Over the Moon'' as Chang'e (Netflix)
** Octavia Spencer – Onward as "Corey" The Manticore (Disney+)

** Sputnik (IFC Films)

** Michiel Huisman – The Other Lamb as Shepherd (IFC Films)
** Dan Stevens – The Rental as Charlie (IFC Films)
| style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"|
* 'Elisabeth Moss – The Invisible Man as Cecilia Kass (Universal)'
** Haley Bennett – Swallow as Hunter Conrad (IFC Films)

| colspan="2" style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"|
